data.title: Q&A with Ray Pettit, Chief Analytics Officer for iTVX at Rentrak â€“ Charlene Weisler
data.meta_description: Dr. Ray Pettit is the Chief Analytics Officer for iTVX at Rentrak, which means that he is deeply immersed in the measurement of branded and in-program content. In this fascinating interview, Pettit talks about iTVX, biometrics in measurement, cross platform applications to iTVX and native advertising measurements. Because he began his career as a musician, Pettit also discusses the importance of a liberal arts education in professional growth. Further, he offers some insights into how the media landscape will look in the next 3-5 years.
